TEXT.English: Animal Designer
TEXT.French: Concepteur d'Animaux

TEXT.English: Animals are designed by genemanipulation.
Build an Animal Designer to increase your cities Gold.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Concepteur d'Animaux Animal[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter les revenus de la ville.

TEXT.English: Culture (Biopunk)

Biopunk (a portmanteau synthesizing "biotechnology" and "punk") is a technoprogressive movement advocating open access to genetic information.Biopunk hobbyists or biohackers experiment with DNA and other aspects of genetics. The related biopunk science fiction genre focuses on biotechnology and subversives.
TEXT.Polish: Biopunk (połączenie "biotechnologii" i "punk") jest technoprogressive ruch propagowania otwartego dostępu do informacji genetycznej. Biopunk hobbystów lub biohackers eksperyment z DNA i innych aspektów genetyki.

TEXT.English: Build Culture (Biopunk) to gain access to unique buildings and units.
TEXT.French: Construire la culture (Biopunk) permet d'accéder à des bâtiments et unités uniques.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci Cultura (Biopunk) per ottenere l'accesso a edifici e unità uniche.

TEXT.English: Biopunk Lab
TEXT.French: Laboratoire Biopunk

TEXT.English: Biopunk (a portmanteau synthesizing "biotechnology" and "punk") is a technoprogressive movement advocating open access to genetic information.Biopunk hobbyists or biohackers experiment with DNA and other aspects of genetics. The related biopunk science fiction genre focuses on biotechnology and subversives.
Build an Biopunk Lab to increase your cities Science.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratoire Biopunk[COLOR_REVERT] améliorera la science de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Chimera Surgery Clinic
TEXT.French: Clinique de Chirurgie Chimérique

TEXT.English: People come here to get some bodyparts of animals.
TEXT.Polish: Ludzie w tej klinice przeszczepiają sobie części ciał zwierząt.

TEXT.English: Build a Chimera Surgery Clinic to increase your cities Gold.
TEXT.French: Construire une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Clinique de Chirurgie Chimérique[COLOR_REVERT] améliorera les revenus de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Designed Animal Battle Arena
TEXT.French: Arène de Combat pour Animaux élaborés

TEXT.English: Animal Designers come here to let their creations fight against each others.
TEXT.Polish: Arena na której walczą zwierzęta zaprojektowane w laboratoriach.

TEXT.English: Build a Designed Animal Battle Arena to increase your cities Gold.
TEXT.French: Construire une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arène de Combat pour Animaux élaborés[COLOR_REVERT] vous permettra de récupérer des revenus supplémentaires pour votre ville.

TEXT.English: Designed Animal Show
TEXT.French: Spectacle d'Animaux élaborés

TEXT.English: Animal Designer from the whole World come to this event to show their creations.
TEXT.Polish: Wystawa projektowanych genetycznie zwierząt z całego świata.

TEXT.English: Build a Designed Animal Show to increase your cities gold.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spectacle d'Animaux élaborés[COLOR_REVERT] pour améliorer les revenus de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Designed Animal Zoo
TEXT.French: Zoo d'Animaux élaborés

TEXT.English: Animals are designed by genemanipulation and exposed in zoos.
Build a Designed Animal Zoo to increase your cities Gold.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoo d'Animaux élaborés[COLOR_REVERT] améliorera les revenus de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Microbiology Artist
TEXT.French: Artiste Microbiologiste

TEXT.English: Microbiology Artists create new microorganisms whose only purpose is that they look beautyful under a Microscope.
TEXT.Polish: Artyści Mikrobiologii tworzą nowe mikroorganizmy, których celem jest wyglądanie pięknie pod mikroskopem.

TEXT.English: Build an Microbiology Artist to increase your cities Science.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Artiste Microbiologiste[COLOR_REVERT] pour améliorer la science de la ville.

TEXT.English: Pheromone Lab
TEXT.French: Laboratoire de Phéromones

TEXT.English: A pheromone is a secreted or excreted chemical factor that triggers a social response in members of the same species. Pheromones are chemicals capable of acting outside the body of the secreting individual to impact the behavior of the receiving individual. There are alarm pheromones, food trail pheromones, sex pheromones, and many others that affect behavior or physiology. Pheromones are used from basic unicellular prokaryotes to complex multicellular eukaryotes. Their use among insects has been particularly well documented. In addition, some vertebrates and plants communicate by using pheromones.
Build a Pheromone Lab to increase your cities Science.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratoire de Phéromones[COLOR_REVERT] améliorera la science de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Protein Artist
TEXT.French: Artiste des protéines

TEXT.English: A Protein Artists create new Proteins whose only purpose is that they look beautyful under a Microscope.
TEXT.Polish: Artyści Protein tworzą nowe białka, których celem jest wyglądanie pięknie pod mikroskopem.

TEXT.English: Build an Protein Artist to increase your cities Science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Artiste des protéines[COLOR_REVERT] pour améliorer la science de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Pure Organic City
TEXT.French: Ville Organique Pure

TEXT.English: The idea is to turn your whole city into green: You life in designed trees, use designed Animals for transport, basically everything is grown naturally.
TEXT.Polish: Całe miasto zamienione w jeden wielki bio-organizm.

TEXT.English: Turn your city into a completely organic to increase it's Health and reduce the pollution, but at the cost of defense.
Species Revival Lab
TEXT.French: Laboratoire de Résurrection d'espèces

TEXT.English: In biology, cloning is the process of producing similar populations of genetically identical individuals that occurs in nature when organisms such as bacteria, insects or plants reproduce asexually. Cloning in biotechnology refers to processes used to create copies of DNA fragments (molecular cloning), cells (cell cloning), or organisms. The term also refers to the production of multiple copies of a product such as digital media or software.
Build a Species Revival Lab to increase your cities Science.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratoire de Résurrection d'espèces[COLOR_REVERT] améliorera la science de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Weaponized Flora
TEXT.French: Végétation Défensive

TEXT.English: Weaponizing the plants allows users to grasp and strike continuously with vines and roots, project thorns at a distance, and quickly regenerate the withering weapons at the user’s will. They can cause horticulture found, i.e. wrap of vines, to grow and climb around a target's neck, causing choking, or even strike with plants. A more subtle technique is to release damaging toxins and pheromones, affecting targets in which conditions should be treated quickly with ailments.
Build a Weaponized Flora to increase your cities Defense.
TEXT.French: Construire une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Végétation Défensive[COLOR_REVERT] augmentera la défense de votre ville.
